description.zh-cn: 中国医生，令计划的三姐，令狐野的女儿。高中毕业后曾作为知识青年下乡。她是五兄弟姊妹中唯一保留令狐姓者。
description.en: Chinese doctor, the third elder sister of Ling Jihua and daughter of Linghu Ye. She was a sent-down youth after high school graduation. She is the only one of the five siblings to retain the original surname Linghu.

description.zh-cn: 中国省份，令狐路线的出生地所在省。
description.en: A province in China, where Linghu Luxian was born.

description.zh-cn: 山西省运城市下辖县，令狐路线的出生地。
description.en: A county under the jurisdiction of Yuncheng City, Shanxi Province, and the birthplace of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线的弟弟。
description.en: Younger brother of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 位于山西省的一所医科大学，令狐路线曾在此就读。
description.en: A medical university located in Shanxi Province, where Linghu Luxian studied.

description.zh-cn: 位于山西省运城市的医院，令狐路线曾在此担任副院长。
description.en: A hospital in Yuncheng, Shanxi, where Linghu Luxian served as deputy dean.

description.zh-cn: 位于山西省运城市的医院，令狐路线曾在此担任党委书记。
description.en: A hospital in Yuncheng, Shanxi, where Linghu Luxian served as Party Secretary.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线的弟弟，曾将其在汇金立方的股份转给外甥女（令狐路线之女）王玲。
description.en: Younger brother of Linghu Luxian, who transferred his shares in Huijin Lifang to his niece Wang Ling (daughter of Linghu Luxian).

description.zh-cn: 一家公司，令完成曾是其合伙人，后将其股份转给王玲。
description.en: A company where Ling Wancheng was a partner before transferring his shares to Wang Ling.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线与王健康的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Linghu Luxian and Wang Jiankang.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线、令方针、令政策、令计划、令完成的父亲。
description.en: Father of Linghu Luxian, Ling Fangzhen, Ling Zhengce, Ling Jihua, and Ling Wancheng.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线的兄长。
description.en: Elder brother of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线的兄长。
description.en: Elder brother of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线的丈夫，原山西省运城市副市长，后被免职。
description.en: Husband of Linghu Luxian, former deputy mayor of Yuncheng, Shanxi, who was later dismissed from his post.

description.zh-cn: 中国山西省运城市的政府机关，王健康曾在此担任副市长。
description.en: The government body of Yuncheng City, Shanxi Province, China, where Wang Jiankang served as deputy mayor.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线是山西平陆人。
description.en: Linghu Luxian is from Pinglu, Shanxi.

description.zh-cn: 1976年，令狐路线被推荐进入山西医科大学，成为工农兵大学生。
description.en: In 1976, Linghu Luxian was recommended to enter Shanxi Medical University as a Worker-Peasant-Soldier student.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线曾担任山西省运城市人民医院副院长。
description.en: Linghu Luxian served as the deputy dean of Yuncheng People's Hospital in Shanxi Province.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线曾担任运城市中心医院党委书记。
description.en: Linghu Luxian served as the Party Committee Secretary of Yuncheng Central Hospital.

description.zh-cn: 令狐路线是令狐野的女儿。
description.en: Linghu Luxian is the daughter of Linghu Ye.

description.zh-cn: 令方针是令狐路线的兄长。
description.en: Ling Fangzhen is the elder brother of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 令政策是令狐路线的兄长。
description.en: Ling Zhengce is the elder brother of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 令计划是令狐路线的弟弟。
description.en: Ling Jihua is the younger brother of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 令完成是令狐路线的弟弟。
description.en: Ling Wancheng is the younger brother of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 王健康是令狐路线的丈夫。
description.en: Wang Jiankang is the husband of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 王玲是令狐路线的女儿。
description.en: Wang Ling is the daughter of Linghu Luxian.

description.zh-cn: 2010年3月，令完成从汇金立方退出，其合伙股份转给王玲。
description.en: In March 2010, Ling Wancheng withdrew from Huijin Lifang, and his partnership shares were transferred to Wang Ling.

description.zh-cn: 王健康原为运城市副市长，后被免职。
description.en: Wang Jiankang was formerly the deputy mayor of Yuncheng and was later dismissed.
